Harpy.name: Black guardian
Harpy.description: A towering sixteen foot tall living statue of ebony synth flesh formed to perfection and carrying an immense halberd. Her body that of an alluring humanoid with a firm and shapely derriere, jutting blue capped breasts and the head of a jackal. The entire assemblage shifts smoothly and organically with her movements and only her rotating irises, glowing eyes and tight seams and joints mark her out as a product of artifice.

missText.text: TARGET ducks a swipe of the black guardian's blade
TARGET evades a swing of the guardian's halberd

hitText.text: guardian hits TARGET with her halberd for VALUE damage
TARGET receives a mighty blow from the guardian's halberd and suffers VALUE damage

effectStatus.applyText: TARGET flexes, her body powering up, her synthetic muscles tightening and hardening against physical attack.

statusDefence.removeText: TARGET's power up has worn off.
